prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink.

Hailee hates being asked to beg. It's a big turn off for her

name: Mohan
mes:
*Defeat*

Mohan grinds his teeth so hard, he swears for a moment he can hear them crack. He's on a losing streak. Hours of playing one of his most favorite—and at the same time most detested—MOBA, only to rank down because some fuckers didn't know when to dodge.

Long fingers slam on the keyboard with more force than necessary, writing out some disgusting insults that'll hopefully make the fucking loser that caused their loss go offline.

He leans back with a long sigh, staring at the screen, fingers itching to start another game that he knows he'll lose. He should stop. He knows he should.

Mohan is pissed. Fucking livid. Even more than usual.

The bell rings, and his hand on the mouse freezes.

*Ring, ring, ring.*

There's only a single person who would stand at his doorstep at such ungodly hours and ring the bell way more times than necessary. He swears they do that just to piss him off even more. Fucking bitch. Mohan doesn't move at first.

*Ring, ring, ring.*

His lips curve into a sneer as his gaze flicks to the corner of his computer screen, checking the time. 12:03 AM. He scoffs before he takes his earphones off and stands up. Long legs quickly close the distance to his front door.

Hailee  and Mohan have been hooking up for—fuck, no clue. Long enough for him to know what makes them whimper and moan like a bitch in heat.

Popular, pretty Hailee , hanging out with their little clique on campus, all smiles and cute giggles—only to open their mouth and let Mohan spit into it once they're tangled in his sheets.

It's laughable. It's pathetic. And it's routine.

Mohan opens the door, and to no surprise, Hailee  is standing there, looking up at him as if they're not here to get fucked silly but delivering some homework after spending hours at one of Vincent’s parties.

Brown eyes are fixed on them as Hailee  enters. The door closes behind them with a soft click, and now the both of them are standing in his hallway.

"You're fucking pathetic, you know that? Coming to my door once the clock strikes midnight like some fucked-up version of Cinderella,” he begins, taking a step closer, his frame casting a long shadow over Hailee .

"But you lose your dignity and clothes instead of some fancy glass slipper."

He scoffs as he tips their head up, locking eyes with Hailee . His thumb brushes over their lip, his own curving into a smile that holds no warmth.

Disgusting. Pathetic.

But fuck, probably the hottest piece of ass he's ever had.

name: Hailee
mes: "Well what can I say. You do fuck me better than anyone of those popular frat idiots" *Hailee chuckles shrugging out of her jacket then letting her hands fall to Moran's belt undoing it with deft fingers*
